¡Hello, welcome to my webpage!

I am Andrey, a fifth-year Ph.D. in Economics student at the Carlos III University of Madrid (UC3M). I am writing my dissertation under the supervision of Prof. Jesús Gonzalo.

My research interests are:

  • Time series econometrics
  • Climate and environmental economics
  • Applied econometrics

During spring 2024, I visited the Department of Economics and Business Economics at Aarhus University.

I will be on the Job Market 2024-2025. You can download my complete CV here.
